pr_title: CAMEL-15417 Add optional fileName parameter on copyDocument function

timeline.message: Add optional fileName parameter on copyDocument function

timeline.bodyText: Can you please use ObjectHelper instead of StringUtils?
timeline.author: oscerd

replies.bodyText:
There is no isEmpty or notNull or some similar method in ObjectHelper class.
Am I looking at the right class ? ObjectHelper from camel-support module.
replies.author: cherepnalkovski

timeline.message: Replace StringUtils utils with ObjectHelper and replace deprecated (getOut) with getMessage method.
Replace updateProperties with another document copy function that accepts new document properties.
